commit.message:
Fix the condition that the current thread is not an active java thread

Signed-off-by: Ashutosh Mehra <asmehra@redhat.com>

Include runtime/javaThread.inline.hpp for JavaThread::is_terminated() to
fix compile failure

Signed-off-by: Ashutosh Mehra <asmehra@redhat.com>

8297285: Shenandoah pacing causes assertion failure during VM
initialization

Signed-off-by: Ashutosh Mehra <asmehra@redhat.com>
